channel.title: DeathzScape Reborn V2! (great 317 source and client)
channel.description:
This is DeathzScape Source V2!!! I have updated many new things!! here are features.. Features: 100% godsword specials 100% godsword running/blocking/attacking/standing 100% d claws 100% minigames 100% mage spells 100% npc attacking 100% good pvp/hybriding 100% great economy! no way to dupe 100% godwars ________AND MANY MORE!!!________
Pics are below.. credits are 50% delta 25% bluurs client 25% to me editing and fixing st00f. enjoy everyone :)
100% Veng other! [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/vengother-1.jpg[/img] Shops [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/shops-1.jpg[/img] 100% Bgs spec! [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/bgs.jpg[/img] 100% Ags spec! [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/ags.jpg[/img] 100% Vengance!(i had bad timing before i took the pic..) [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/veng.jpg[/img] 100% Sgs spec! [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/sgs.jpg[/img] Home [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/home-3.jpg[/img] Explock [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/explock.jpg[/img] 100% dragon claw special and emote!! [img]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh219/brendagriffiths_2008/dclaws.jpg[/img]
Source:[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VI2MPLN3]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VI2MPLN3[/url] Client:[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=OQDT62UA]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=OQDT62UA[/url]
Don't flame or anything if you don't like the post please move on.. its just your opinion. If you like it i would like to hear your feedback on the source/client.
ALSO!!! for fail leechers.. if u wanna know how to change the ip of a client u need to go to the GUI and search "serverip"

item.title: DeathzScape Reborn V2! (great 317 source and client)
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

If you are on windows 7 this WILL NOT WORK with a regular run.bat file. You need to create a new run.bat file with the following information…

@echo off
Title Client
cd Client Files
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
EXIT

But I’ve also noticed this source has Dragon arrows, Zamorakian spear, Dagon hai, and a ton of other newer items that rs has. Nothing like Torva… But it has full PvP armour.

Read full topic

PMing atm.

item.title: DeathzScape Reborn V2! (great 317 source and client)
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

[quote=“CartzScape, post:112, topic:341628”]Hey awesome server and i am really determined to play so please help me out with this i have been trying to crack the problem but its just confusing :L.
okay so i believe the run.bat on the source is using the wrong port because i can open it with my other source using port 43594 but when opening two of deathzscape sources it says port is already in use so yeah i think that may be a problem :L.
And yeah with the client itself i fixed multiple errors and added my ipaddess in the GUI and yeah the it didnt open at first but now it does and when i type username and pass wont connect its probs linked with the error above ^. now some screenies of me problem :L

That’s with another run.bat i used so it could show me the issue which i can’t seem to fix and well i’ll show you the port problem aswell

Uploaded with ImageShack.us


yeah and just a picure of the client after trying to log in

Uploaded with ImageShack.us[/quote]

Open port 5555. Should fix the problem.

Also, this is a fair server… I put about 50 hours of work into it and I’m not going to host… And when you say full GWD, you should probably have mentioned just the npcs were available. I had to create the option to go to which boss… Also, tons of npcs everywhere that were really just not needed at all. Basically a second home in Nardah…

Anyways, it’s a good base. Put the time in to improve it and you can get a better result. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: DeathzScape Reborn V2! (great 317 source and client)
item.dc:creator: @CartzScape CartzScape
item.description:
@CartzScape wrote:

Hey awesome server and i am really determined to play so please help me out with this i have been trying to crack the problem but its just confusing :L.
okay so i believe the run.bat on the source is using the wrong port because i can open it with my other source using port 43594 but when opening two of deathzscape sources it says port is already in use so yeah i think that may be a problem :L.
And yeah with the client itself i fixed multiple errors and added my ipaddess in the GUI and yeah the it didnt open at first but now it does and when i type username and pass wont connect its probs linked with the error above ^. now some screenies of me problem :L

That’s with another run.bat i used so it could show me the issue which i can’t seem to fix and well i’ll show you the port problem aswell

Uploaded with ImageShack.us


yeah and just a picure of the client after trying to log in

Uploaded with ImageShack.us
